summary: bad things about Pokemon SWSH: pokemon missing, character models phase in and out of existence, the trees look like they were...
body:
bad things about Pokemon SWSH: pokemon missing, character models phase in and out of existence, the trees look like they were made for a n64 game

good thing(s) about Pokemon SWSH: you and your pokemon do a cute lil’ cheer after beating a gym leader

summary:
Risk of Rain 2 coming Nintendo Switch  The classic multiplayer roguelike, Risk of Rain, returns with an extra 
dimension and...
caption:
Risk of Rain 2 coming Nintendo Switch

The classic multiplayer roguelike, Risk of Rain, returns with an extra dimension and more challenging action. Play solo, or team up with up to three friends to fight your way through hordes of monsters, unlock new loot, and find a way to escape the planet.

title: Nintendo Switch for $254.96
body:
Altatac through Rakuten has the Nintendo Switch Console with Neon Blue and Red Joy-Con for $254.96 (299.99 - 15% coupon) with Free Shipping for a limited time. To get the discount, use the coupon code: SAVE15 at checkout.

The Nintendo Switch is a unique hybrid system that blurs the line between console gaming and mobile play. With its modular design and adaptable Joy-Con controllers, Nintendo Switch can be played with family and friends in the comfort of your living room, or lifted from the included dock for the same great gaming experience that now travels with you. In TV Mode, you can dock the console, attach the Joy-Con controllers to the included Joy-Con grip accessory and play on your TV for a traditional gaming experience. If you’re gaming on the go, you can instantly transition to Handheld Mode by removing the console from the dock and attaching the Joy-Con controllers to the sides. With its bright, high-definition touchscreen display and robust battery offering hours of mobile play, Nintendo Switch offers the full gaming experience at home and beyond.

summary: Cris Tales Para Nintendo Switch… ¿En Formato Físico? #shironodesaina #nekodemonio #CorporativoArcanos #Noticias #Nintendo...
title: Cris Tales Para Nintendo Switch… ¿En Formato Físico? #shironodesaina #nekodemonio #CorporativoArcanos #Noticias #Nintendo #Juegos #CrisTales
body:
Cris Tales Para Nintendo Switch… ¿En Formato Físico? #shironodesaina #nekodemonio #CorporativoArcanos #Noticias #Nintendo #Juegos #CrisTales

Tal parece que Modus Games tiene planeado lanzar Cris Tales para Nintendo Switch en formato físico. Conoce más acerca de este interesante RPG.

Antes, durante y después del Nintendo Direct del E3 2019, diversos títulos fueron anunciados y/o confirmados para la consola híbrida de la compañía. Uno de ellos fue Cris Tales para Nintendo Switch. Se trata de un desarrollo de parte de Dreams…

View On WordPress

blog.name: mrgilderpixels
blog.title: MrGilder's Pixels
blog.description:
Hi, I'm Chris. I'm an artist, a writer, and a lifelong fan of video games and animation. I like to use my art to conjure up warm, fuzzy memories of lazy Saturday mornings filled with Transformers reruns and oldschool video game marathon sessions. Let's be friends!

Check me out on Twitter or Instagram as @mrgilderpixels!

website: www.mrgilderpixels.com

summary: I am insanely proud of how well my exploration of the sprite work in Super #Mario All-Stars has been going. Every one of these...
caption:
I am insanely proud of how well my exploration of the sprite work in Super #Mario All-Stars has been going. Every one of these #paintings is brimming with color and personality. I’m far from finished plumbing the depths of this game’s gorgeous aesthetic. ⠀
These pieces, and more like them, will be available for sale at my @officialSaikouCon booth this August 2nd through 4th. Come say Hi! ⠀
⠀
#nintendo #pixelart #pixelpainting #gaming #videogames #gameart #art #artistsoninstagram #mrgilderpixels #supermariobros #nintendo #SFC #SNES #Supernintendo #superfamicom #fanart #wood #acrylicpaint #supermarioallstars #16bit #retro #retrogaming
https://www.instagram.com/p/BzG8ZGPnWeL/?igshid=7rmznbpvaaup

There’s still 2 fucking slots in the DLC fighters for Smash Ultimate.

We already have two major long sought after choices… Who could possibly be left that could impress us?

summary: The Original Gaming Master! For anyone who has ever played Nintendo (both Arcade and NES) - a must-watch for any Gamers out...
caption:
The Original Gaming Master!

For anyone who has ever played Nintendo (both Arcade and NES) - a must-watch for any Gamers out there! 

I still prefer the old school games myself - although I do appreciate the heck out of the new games (which I never play). I think the new games have SO much going on (which turns fun into work), and the appeal about the original classics is that they are primarily focused on FUN. Granted there were always challenging games for the advanced players - either way I kick it old school (OH YEAH!).

I still prefer the old school games myself - although I do appreciate the heck out of the new games (which I never play). I think the new games have SO much going on (which turns fun into work), and the appeal about the original classics is that they are primarily focused on FUN. Granted there were always challenging games for the advanced players - either way I kick it old school (OH YEAH!).
